AppearIn_Bot: The bot user that will represent appear.in
AppearIn_Bot_Description: Create a bot user and type his username here.
Customize_Icon_Description: Change the icon that is used for messages from this integration.
Customize_Name_Description: Choose the username that this integration will post as.
Enable_AppearIn_Command_Description: Whether or not the `/appear` command should be enabled.
Slash_Command_Description: Launch an appear.in video conference from a channel.
